front.title: LDAP Schema for supporting XMPP in White Pages

abstract.t: The Extensible Messaging and Presence Protocol (XMPP) identifies users by use of JID (Jabber IDs). Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) enables provision of a white pages service with schema relating to users and support for internet protocols. This specification defines schema to enable XMPP JIDs to be associated with objects in an LDAP directory so that this information can be used with white pages applications.
